text: Ye Xuanping (; 20 December 1924 â€“ 17 September 2019) was a Chinese politician. He was Mayor of Guangzhou from 1985 to 1991 and Governor of Guangdong from 1985 to 1991. Ye was born in Meixian, Guangdong. Ye was a strong supporter of Deng Xiaoping's reform and opening policy. Ye died on 17 September 2019 in Guangdong at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Guangdong Category:Chinese mayors Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Ye Xuanping
